Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (17/01/2022)
-------------------
- First Release


0.0.2 (17/02/2022)
-------------------
- Minor fixes


0.0.3 (18/02/2022)
-------------------
- New functions: vertpitch, leaguepitch and helper


0.0.4 (28/02/2022)
-------------------
- New function: badge
	- Allows for simple addition of a teams logo to the display
- Fixed z-order errors that prevented scatter plots
- Optimized functions


0.0.5 (30/03/2022)
-------------------
- New function: zones()
- Bug fixes
- Optimization fixes


0.0.6 (30/03/2022)
-------------------
- Minor Adjustments to version 5
- Fixed the zones function
